title: Animal Crossing Dialogue font?
content:
I actually ripped the main font texture from the game.  
 [LINK](http://web.archive.org/web/20090629074859/http:/img166.imageshack.us/my.php?image=txt28910ld0.png)  
But, is there a font similar to this one (just focusing on Roman lettering)?  
I was thinking about making one myself, but I have no clue on how to do it.

Thanks.  
DTR

[EDIT: Any free variations? :D]
author: dtr138

comments.content:
It’s Wanpaku Gothic designed by [Yutaka Sato](http://web.archive.org/web/20090629074859/http:/www.type-labo.jp/) (佐藤豊).  
 [Morisawa version](http://web.archive.org/web/20090629074859/http:/www.morisawa.co.jp/font/fontlist/details/fontfamily047.html) and [Fontworks version](http://web.archive.org/web/20090629074859/http:/www.fontworks.co.jp/typography/fontsample/kana/wanpaku_ub.html) are available.

But, the latin characters might not be Wanpaku Gothic. Probably they are [Rodin](http://web.archive.org/web/20090629074859/http:/www.fontworks.co.jp/typography/fontsample/classic/rodin_ub.html)’s latin characters. Rodin is also a Japanese font from Fontworks. So, the two fonts are mixed. I don’t know its substitutes.
